briefTitle: A Study to Investigate the Antihypertensive Efficacy of MK0954

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patient has been diagnosed with mild to moderate hypertension (SDBP 95-115 mm Hg)
* Patient has no medical problems or treatments that might effect their blood pressure

Exclusion Criteria:

* Pregnant or lactating females
* Patient has secondary hypertension or malignant hypertension
* Sitting systolic blood pressure \> 210 mm Hg
* History of stroke
* History of myocardial infarction with in past year
* Current or prior history of heart failure
* Known hypersensitivity to losartan
* Prior exposure to losartan
* Patients known to be HIV positive
* Patient is abusing or has abused alcohol or other drugs within the past 4 years

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Change From Baseline in Trough Sitting Diastolic Blood Pressure (SiDBP) at Week 12
outcomeMeasures.description: Mean change from baseline in trough (24 hours post dose) SiDBP at Week 12

outcomeMeasures.title: Categories of Hypertensive Response in Trough Diastolic Blood Pressure (SiDBP) at Week 6
outcomeMeasures.description: Patients with trough SiDBP \<90 mm Hg were in Category I, ≥90 but decreased at least 10 mm Hg were in Category II, and ≥90 and decreased less than 10 mm Hg were in Category III.

outcomeMeasures.title: Categories of Hypertensive Response in Trough Diastolic Blood Pressure (SiDBP) at Week 12
outcomeMeasures.description: Patients with trough SiDBP \<90 mm Hg were in Category I, ≥90 but decreased at least 10 mm Hg were in Category II, and ≥90 and decreased less than 10 mm Hg were in Category III.

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Change From Baseline in Trough Sitting Diastolic Blood Pressure (SiDBP) at Week 6
outcomeMeasures.description: Mean change from baseline in trough (24 hours post dose) SiDBP at Week 6

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Change From Baseline in Peak Sitting Diastolic Blood Pressure (SiDBP) at Week 6
outcomeMeasures.description: Mean change from baseline in peak (6 hours post dose) SiDBP at Week 6

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Change From Baseline in Peak Sitting Diastolic Blood Pressure (SiDBP) at Week 12
outcomeMeasures.description: Mean change from baseline in peak (6 hours post dose) SiDBP at Week 12
